title: Non Ultimate; 300 Base Damage .8 scaling 3 second AOE silence

replies.body: I like how you complain about the Q, and not the W/E/R

Im amazed that Malzahar hasn't been picked in LCS now that you think about it, AoE health shred, the ability to neutralise a threat for 2.5 seconds in a teamfight, the rare ability to force someone to deviate from their standard build and the aoe silence that cripples about anything that needs abilities to function, all he needs is haunting guise and sorc shoes to really take control of fights.

Except for the fact that he is really simple to shut down, especially at a LCS level.

His great for solo queue, but put him against a co-ordinated team and your probably a little fucked.

I get ebola everytiem ;_: 

Malzahar E ... Why Rito!!!!
Yeah, his q is always fun. Plus the burn over time w and e
